title: AdvPrefix: An Objective for Nuanced LLM Jailbreaks
details: S Zhu, B Amos, Y Tian, C Guo, I Evtimov - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.10321, 2024
abstract: Many jailbreak attacks on large language models (LLMs) rely on a common objective: making the model respond with the prefix" Sure, here is (harmful request)". While straightforward, this objective has two limitations: limited control over model …
